response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its worth to you at $800,000. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value and my expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
